sqlReaderQuery.value:
with cte as
(
SELECT 
	[No_],
	[Sell-to Customer No_],
	[Bill-to Customer No_],
	[Ship-to Code],
	[Ship-to Name],
	[Ship-to Address],
	[Ship-to Address 2],
	[Ship-to City],
	[Posting Date],
	[Shipment Date],
	[Shipment Method Code],
	[Location Code],
	[Shortcut Dimension 1 Code],
	[Shortcut Dimension 2 Code],
	[Shipping Agent Code],
	[LR_RR No_],
	[LR_RR Date],
	[Vehicle No_],
	[Vehicle Type],
	[Route Code],
	[Customer Category],
	[Loading Slip No_],
	[AutoPDASO],
	[ECOM],
	[Last Modified On],
	'AP' as Site_Code
FROM [dbo].[BIPL - ANDHRA PRADESH$Sales Shipment Header]
where year([Posting Date]) >= 2021
UNION ALL
SELECT 
	[No_],
	[Sell-to Customer No_],
	[Bill-to Customer No_],
	[Ship-to Code],
	[Ship-to Name],
	[Ship-to Address],
	[Ship-to Address 2],
	[Ship-to City],
	[Posting Date],
	[Shipment Date],
	[Shipment Method Code],
	[Location Code],
	[Shortcut Dimension 1 Code],
	[Shortcut Dimension 2 Code],
	[Shipping Agent Code],
	[LR_RR No_],
	[LR_RR Date],
	[Vehicle No_],
	[Vehicle Type],
	[Route Code],
	[Customer Category],
	[Loading Slip No_],
	[AutoPDASO],
	[ECOM],
	[Last Modified On],
	'CHE' as Site_Code
FROM [dbo].[BIPL - CHENNAI$Sales Shipment Header]
where year([Posting Date]) >= 2021
UNION ALL
SELECT 
	[No_],

	[Ship-to Name],
	[Ship-to Address],
	[Ship-to Address 2],

	[Posting Date],
	[Shipment Date],
	[Shipment Method Code],
	[Location Code],

Select * from cte 
where 
	cte.Site_Code = '@{activity('WatermarkTable').output.resultSets[0].rows[0].Site_Code}'
	and 
	cte.[Last Modified On] > '@{activity('WatermarkTable').output.resultSets[0].rows[0].Last_Modified_Date}' 
	and 
	and cte.[Last_Modified_On] <= '@{activity('Newlookup').output.resultSets[0].rows[0].Last_Modified_On}'

with cte as

(SELECT
